meanings.definition: Convert (data or images) into a digital form that can be processed by a computer.
meanings.sent1: I will digitize the old family photos to save them on my computer.
meanings.sent2: It is important to digitize important documents for easy access and storage.
meanings.sent3: Grandma asked me to digitize her recipes so she can access them on her tablet.
meanings.sent4: The artist decided to digitize his paintings to reach a wider audience online.
meanings.sent5: Digitizing the library's catalog made finding books much quicker and simpler.

meanings.sent1: The scientist needed to digitize the experimental results for analysis.
meanings.sent2: It is common practice to digitize survey responses for statistical purposes.
meanings.sent3: I had to digitize my shopping list to keep track of my expenses.
meanings.sent4: Digitizing the budget made it easier to track expenses and savings.
meanings.sent5: She decided to digitize her schedule to better organize her time.
